name: DoomZ Destruction
effectText:
Target 1 "DoomZ" Xyz Monster you control; equip this card to it with the following effect.
‚óèCards cannot be added from the Main Deck to your opponent's hand except by drawing them.
If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; equip 1 "DoomZ" monster from your Deck to it as an Equip Spell. You can only use each effect of "DoomZ Destruction" once per turn.
